formattedAddress: 370 W 51st St, New York, NY 10019, USA
adrFormatAddress: 370 W 51st St, New York, NY 10019, USA

editorialSummary.text: Tiny option serving up Italian wines paired with small bites in a brick-walled space.

originalText.text: A very traditional and worthwhile selection of Italian dishes. The price is perfect. Meatball is impressive to me. The cheesecake is worth mentioning! The cheese they used was very unique, fresh, and suitable. I was very impressed. I believe that this cheesecake has no competition at the same or double price point.

The cheese they used was very unique, fresh, and suitable. I was very impressed. I believe that this cheesecake has no competition at the same or double price point.

originalText.text: I am forever grateful for this recommendation. What a gem!! I keep going back here for the food and such friendly staff! Feels like such a nice, cozy oasis/getaway in Hell‚Äôs Kitchen. I am that person that will always order the same thing, but had to try their latest special! Veal chop with mashed potatoes and asparagus in a mushroom sauce. YUMMMMM! Run don‚Äôt walk while it‚Äôs on the menu. Also always order the following starters: eggplant goat cheese, lamp chop lollipops, warm octopus salad.. actually just order everything on the appetizers menu. You won‚Äôt regret it!!!

originalText.text: Truly a hidden gem. This good was incredible and you will leave here feeling stuffed. We ordered everything off the specials menu. Started with the grilled octopus salad app watch was perfectly cooked, truffle gnocchi which was melt in your mouth delicious, and the lamb shank with an herb risotto. The risotto by itself was ok but paired with the lamb and the sauce, it was the perfect compliment. The seafood risotto was also very good. Cute and cozy vibes, the GM Mark took very good care of us. We will absolutely be back.

text.text: Truly a hidden gem. This good was incredible and you will leave here feeling stuffed. We ordered everything off the specials menu. Started with the grilled octopus salad app watch was perfectly cooked, truffle gnocchi which was melt in your mouth delicious, and the lamb shank with an herb risotto. The risotto by itself was ok but paired with the lamb and the sauce, it was the perfect compliment. The seafood risotto was also very good. Cute and cozy vibes, the GM Mark took very good care of us. We will absolutely be back.

originalText.text:
Came here with two friends because one of them visited before and loved it.

There is an outside area, a bar area, and a dining area. The dining area is small and the bar area decor is casual. The ambiance really does make me think I‚Äôm in Italy. It‚Äôs cozy and I do feel that you can spend a lot of time here. I would keep in mind that the area by the bar is a bit narrow and the dining room is a bit small as well.

We had Alex as our server and he was very friendly. I had an Aperol spritz. It personally wasn‚Äôt my favorite. My appetizer was the lamb chops and my gosh. These lamb chops were amazing!

For our mains, we ordered the special lamb shank risotto, I ordered the Rigatoni e Gamberi, and Steak special. I wanted to order the Lamb, but since I‚Äôm not a mashed potato eater I couldn‚Äôt get it. The lamb was DELICIOUS! I also liked my friend's steak. When it came to my Rigatoni, it was a bit dry and lackluster. I was a bit sad.

We finished with the Tiramisu and it was delicious!

In all, I feel like Briciola excels with their meat-based meals. I would recommend this as a casual date whether it be with friends or a significant other.

I see so many good reviews on the pasta, so I wouldn‚Äôt mind trying it again.

originalText.text:
Briciola Restaurant is an absolute gem! My recent visit left me thoroughly impressed. The charcuterie board they offer is a work of art - a delightful assortment of cheeses, cured meats, and perfectly paired accompaniments. Each bite was a flavor explosion!

But what truly sets Briciola apart is their top-notch staff. From the moment I walked in, I felt like a valued guest. They were knowledgeable about the menu, offered excellent recommendations, and provided attentive service throughout the evening.

To top it off, the prices were incredibly reasonable, especially considering the quality of the food and service. Briciola has become my go-to spot for an exquisite dining experience that won‚Äôt break the bank. I can‚Äôt wait to return and explore more of their delicious offerings. Highly recommended! üçΩÔ∏èüëè
